title: Come visit the grove, the best in town 2 bed 2 baths available today
posting_body: The apartment is in a great location.
All of our units are newly renovated and look wonderful.
We have installed dark hardwood style flooring, brand new stainless steel appliances, full sized washer and dryer in unit, quartz counter tops, ceiling fans, brand new carpet, and LED lighting!
Our apartments also feature a very spacious patio and a 4x10 storage unit.
Experience the tranquility of living at a newly-renovated community while remaining in the heart of Silicon Valley.
Our community has transformed into a modern, vibrant living center with an unparalleled quality of living.
Relax in our poolside cabana while enjoying our free Wi-Fi.
Exercise in our newly-constructed gym which is located near our second pool.
Enjoy the evening at the fire pit adjacent to our modernized Jacuzzi.
Reserve our beautiful clubhouse with kitchenette for your next event.
Enjoy the convenience and reliability of our package lockers for all of your deliveries, as well as the peace of mind that comes with living in a gated and patrolled community.
Our community features a children's play area, as well as exterior bicycle storage options.
All of these features and many more are available to our residents.
In order to assure the highest quality of living for our residents, some restrictions apply (breed, weight, etc. call for details!)
In addition to our community amenities, all our residents can enjoy modern in-unit laundry machines as well as upgraded stainless-steel kitchen appliances including dishwashers and microwaves.
A generous storage space comes standard on your private patio or balcony, as does ample closet space within the home.
Some of our top-floor apartments even offer air conditioning!
Seize the opportunity to reserve your dream apartment today with only a $600 deposit, which is fully refundable within three days.
Be sure to ask about our latest move-in specials!
Our friendly and knowledgeable management staff will guide you through the simple application process and ensure that your move-in is free of uncertainties.
Call us today to schedule a tour of your new home!
Please also visit us on the web.
We hope to see you soon!
The Grove Garden, managed by Sares-Regis Group
Special offers and pricing available to new leases only, not renewals, transfers or current residents
